title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Dak's Setback, LeBron's Odd Moves, Big Ben's Power Play
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Dak's Setback, LeBron's Odd Moves, Big Ben's Power Play
description:
The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. Colin rants on what makes the NFL unstoppable (0:26), why the Colts entire season is in jeopardy (0:57), and the antique store that is the Lakers roster (3:34). Ike Taylor on the surprising difference between Big Ben and Aaron Rodgers, how his Steeler teams intimidated their opponents, and what makes Tom Brady so disrespectful (6:37). John Middlekauff on his dark horse candidate for NFL MVP (18:20), and Mike Silver on his concerns about Dak and the Cowboys (29:00). Make sure to follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates, and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
